public class TimeDrivenGenerator
extends Generator

A generator which creates elements following a temporal pattern.

Ivan Castilla Rodrguez

Constructor Detail

TimeDrivenGenerator

public TimeDrivenGenerator(Simulation simul,
                           BasicElementCreator creator,
                           SimulationCycle cycle)
Creates a generator driven by a time cycle.

Parameters:
simul - Simulation which uses this generator
creator - The way the elements are created every "tic" of the cycle
cycle - Control of the time between generations

nextTs

public long nextTs()
Returns the next timestamp when elements have to be generated.

Returns:
The next timestamp to generate elements. NaN if this generator don't have to create more elements.

beforeCreate

public void beforeCreate()
Launches a new generation event (if needed) or a finalize event (if there is no more generation cycles remain).
